title: A Wild New Grand Tour World: How ‘Mega-Merger’ Changes the Game in the Race for the Tour de France
content:
Grand tour racing could be turned upside down by potential 'Soudal-Visma' fusion, and Tadej Pogačar could profit.

Read the full article at A Wild New Grand Tour World: How ‘Mega-Merger’ Changes the Game in the Race for the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
